articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Woman takes 10x dose of turmeric, gets hospitalized for liver damage - Ars Technica
articles.description: Although she eventually recovered, she was close to needing a liver transplant.

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: YouTube is getting rid of its Trending page and Trending Now list - TechCrunch
articles.description: YouTube is replacing these Trending lists with category-specific charts, the company announced on Thursday.
articles.content: YouTube is removing its Trending page and Trending Now list in favor of category-specific charts, the company announced on Thursday. With this change, YouTube is moving away from the single, all-enco… [+2635 chars]
